title: Metric with order by
metric_query: select count(*) as result from {var__trp_table} where {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS};
group_by_1_query: select {var__group_by_1}, count(*) as result from {var__trp_table} where {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} GROUP BY {var__group_by_1} ORDER BY {var__order_by};
group_by_2_query: select {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2}, count(*) as result from {var__trp_table} where {CORE_FILTERS} and {TRP_FILTERS} GROUP BY {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2} ORDER BY {var__order_by};
